snippet.title: Plague Tale Requiem Full Presentation | gamescom 2022 Xbox Booth
snippet.description:
We get a deeper dive on a Plague Tale Requiem during this segment at the Xbox Booth Showcase. Get more insight on the game from game director Kevin Choteau from Asobo Studios. The game now has 300,000 rats compared to the 5,000 in Plague Tale Innocence. 

#xbox #gamescom #gaming
